titleStmt.title: The Popish forgery detected [r]emarks on the paper delivered by Margaret Martel to the under-sheriff at the time and [p]lace of her execution, at Suffolk-street end, July 16, 1697 [for] the barbarous murther of Elizabeth Pullen, wife of Paul [P]ullen, Esq.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by E. Whitlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library (London, England)
